title: Rito r u ok
body:
like rito its not even april **its not even spring**
u sure noone was on drugs during this skin production ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

replies.body:
Riot Skin Team
"Man last nite I had a horrible dream of a bunny rabbit fizz chasing me, IDK about you, but Im not doing shrooms for awhile"
".......huh, well we havent had a fizz skin in a year"

Meanwhile everyone else:
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AXzEcwYs8Eo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AXzEcwYs8Eo)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-A8hMRIRQoA

Yeessss.... Let the JonTron consume you!
My work here is going well indeed...

Anyone who spread the word of Jon is a good person.

Godspeed, my friend, and may the wings of Jaques guide you.

"not doing shrooms... shrooms.. teemo... cottontail teemo.... COTTONTAIL FIZZ!"
This is how i assume the idea was conceived.

https://youtu.be/XcxKIJTb3Hg

"Oh, it's just a ahmless littal bunny, in't it?"
there are so many potential league parallels in that movie
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSGkBWYDmrM
And people say Lollipoppy is the stuff of nightmares...

They're wrong.  This is the stuff of nightmares.  Lollipoppy is......
http://i.imgur.com/U5J0tK8.jpg

......something worse.
Never trust a scorpion hiding in a big quartz cave.
*waits 12 seconds in a bush* skar- skar- _LOLLIPOPPY_ {{champion:72}}
I miss the old forums 1000+ page Lollipoppy thread
Fizz and Lollipoppy team up for bot lane
Christmas in July... wait. Nope. I got nothin'.
Thanks for the Bugs Bunny Skin. Brings back good memories. :)

Meanwhile I'm still waiting for a kennen skin. 
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kzsJA9vNX_w/UIwXFTVl5-I/AAAAAAAAARk/C_js3fyyijo/s320/waiting.jpg
{{champion:83}}  tell me about it.
{{champion:44}} Join the club
{{champion:154}} - Oh wait.
Awkward, isn't it?
{{champion:45}} {{champion:17}} - Clearly we need more skins Kappa
{{champion:50}} No Acknowledgement since Sion Rework even after dropping a massive hint at a VU or possible Rework. Last Skin was 2012 at the end of the old JoJ.
What I'm gathering from this is that Cottontail skins are officially for the exclusive use of widely despised champs. Fitting.
Rather than a Cottontail skin-line, maybe just bunnies in general for widely despised champions. Can't forget about Battle Bunny Riven.

Am I the only one thinking of a {{champion:429}} bunny?

hop hop hop hop hop hop hop hop hop

Fizz is a tiny little annoying shit who slowly wears down both your patience and your life bar. Just like {{champion:17}}.

It's only fitting they get a matching troll skin set.
Because clearly, Fizz doesnt have enough skins
He needs a skin that properly conveys how much everyone hates him.  Teemo has a Cottontail skin too.  Coincidence?  I think not.
Riven also has a bunny skin as well. All we need now is for Zed to get his bunny suit.

Bunny Zed throwing around carrots instead of Shurikens? 

Alright, I'm game.
what about {{champion:7}} and {{champion:55}}

Rito just understands the troll-ish psychology of the kind of person who plays Fizz or Teemo. We don't just want to *beat* our opponents - we want to *annoy the shit out of them* while doing it! Anything that aids that purpose, and what better than an overly cutesy, irritating costume? Capturing the Bugs Bunny spirit of "*Tee-hee-hee, can't catch me!*", this skin will further our goal of pissing people the fuck off.

I say that Master Yi, Heimerdinger, and Blitzcrank get some bunny skins then too. lol. 

lol... Master BunnYi...

Fizz's facial expression reminds me so damn much of Happy Tree Friends.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WjA6F8Qg8As
And I thought Feaster Bunny Bakasura was terrifying.

so cottontail fizz AND teemo, the antichrist and the devil working together...
no one on the rift is safe
please do not give people a reason for people to play fizz

This skin gave me cancer. Thx rito <3

{{item:3070}}

The mere existence of this skin makes me want to stop playing Fizz. It makes me ashamed of my ways. It tells me that I am, in fact, no better than the Teemo mains of the world.

Good God, Rito. This is a crime against humanity.
like what the actual hell is the art team even doing.  Did they fire everybody with artistic ability?

U know i think i have a better skin idea...how about a pirate fizz with this whole bilgewater thing going on. Pirate Fizz, his ult is he shoots out a little pirate ship and instead of a shark its a giant Kraken!!!!
I really like this skin alot! We need more skins like this! Cute/scary theme. Its the perfect amount of creepy.
So whose legs are those at the top of the picture?
Eugh this skin
this is a freaking awesome skin, too bad im terrible at fizz lol
Probably. The Fact That Riot Made Fizzes Ult A Carrot Screaming For Its Life Is Kindda Sad.
nobody is ok anymore {{champion:105}}
Rito, are you okay? You okay? You okay, Rito?
